comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

issue.title: microsoft.copilot.com

issue.body:

comment.body:
![Screenshot_20240625_223525_AdGuard](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28495838/050d8bdf-0c5a-42fb-b703-be2afccc0bcb)
![Screenshot_20240625_223534_AdGuard](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28495838/09c8554e-4b28-4d76-a521-ba1eee996e70)
![Screenshot_20240625_223541_AdGuard](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28495838/a26ce7ed-336b-42e7-91df-cc58034e56d0)
![Screenshot_20240625_223547_AdGuard](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28495838/a5ae2043-8b08-4628-a9d6-e9e49cb12979)


> @deltaxsingh Hello there. Unfortunately, I am unable to reproduce the ad. Could you please go to the AdGuard filter log (4th tab --> resent activity) and clear the filter log (three dots in the top right corner --> clear)? Open the app, replay the ad, go to the filter log, take screenshots of the filter log and attach the screenshots to a comment on GitHub?

Here you go! It's ONLY in the Copilot app on Android. The website is clean!

issue.title: www.duolingo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.duolingo.com/shop](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.duolingo.com%2Fshop) ### Comment > Duolingo shows popups all over the site that tell me to turn off the adblocker. Also, there are many ads about buying "Super Duolingo" that were not blocked either. Username: `@ShavedBird` ### Screenshots

issue.title: racketboy.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://racketboy.com/retro/best-undiscovered-nintendo-nes-games](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fracketboy.com%2Fretro%2Fbest-undiscovered-nintendo-nes-games) ### Comment > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/8cd2a77eaf890fe4879339459bdd4c767ee7ed78 added `http://www.amazon` but I get `https` Amazon links. > > Suggestion: replace this part with `a[href*="amazon.com/exec"]`. The rest of the rule is already specific enough. ### Screenshots
